Nemeses Unlock 1.requires: |Vortex - Nemeses| and (|Progressive Vision Rarity:2| or (|Companion Unit| and |Companion Rarity +1|))

Nemeses Unlock 2.requires: |Vortex - Nemeses| and (|Progressive Vision Rarity:3| or (|Companion Unit| and |Companion Rarity +1:2|))

Victory.requires: (|Vortex - Nemeses| and (|Progressive Vision Rarity:3| or (|Companion Unit| and |Companion Rarity +1:2|)))
